eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.ckan

Class CkanClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.ckan.CkanClient

  • public class CkanClient
extends Object
    Class to access a ckan instance. Threadsafe.
    Author:
    David Leoni, Ivan Tankoyeu

      • makeDatasetURL

        public static String makeDatasetURL(String catalogUrl,
                    String datasetIdentifier)
        Given some dataset parameters, reconstruct the URL of dataset page in the catalog website. Valid URLs have this format with the name: http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/impianti-di-risalita-vivifiemme-2013
        Parameters:
        datasetIdentifier - either of name the dataset (preferred) or the alphanumerical id.
        catalogUrl - i.e. http://dati.trentino.it

      • makeResourceURL

        public static String makeResourceURL(String catalogUrl,
                     String datasetIdentifier,
                     String resourceId)
        Given some resource parameters, reconstruct the URL of resource page in the catalog website. Valid URLs have this format with the dataset name 'impianti-di-risalita-vivifiemme-2013': http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/impianti-di-risalita-vivifiemme-2013/resource/779d1d9d-9370-47f4-a194-1b0328c32f02
        Parameters:
        catalogUrl - i.e. http://dati.trentino.it
        datasetIdentifier - the dataset name (preferred) or the alphanumerical id
        resourceId - the alphanumerical id of the resource (DON'T use resource name)

      • makeGroupURL

        public static String makeGroupURL(String catalogUrl,
                  String groupId)
        Given some group parameters, reconstruct the URL of group page in the catalog website. Valid URLs have this format with the group name 'gestione-del-territorio': http://dati.trentino.it/group/gestione-del-territorio
        Parameters:
        catalogUrl - i.e. http://dati.trentino.it
        groupId - the group name as in CkanGroupStructure.getName() (preferred), or the group's alphanumerical id.

      • getDatasetList

        public List<String> getDatasetList()
        Returns:
        list of strings like i.e. limestone-pavement-orders
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getDatasetList

        public List<String> getDatasetList(Integer limit,
                          Integer offset)
        Parameters:
        limit -
        offset - Starts with 0 included. getDatasetList(1,0) will return exactly one dataset, if catalog is not empty.
        Returns:
        list of data names like i.e. limestone-pavement-orders
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getGroupList

        public List<CkanGroup> getGroupList()
        Returns the groups present in Ckan. Notice that organizations will not be returned by this method. To get them, use getOrganizationList() instead.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getGroupNames

        public List<String> getGroupNames()
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getGroup

        public CkanGroup getGroup(String idOrName)
        Returns a Ckan group. Do not pass an organization id, to get organization use getOrganization(java.lang.String) instead.
        Parameters:
        idOrName - either the group name (i.e. hospitals-in-trento-district) or the group alphanumerical id
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getOrganizationList

        public List<CkanOrganization> getOrganizationList()
        Returns the organizations present in CKAN.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error
        See Also:
        getGroupList()

      • getOrganization

        public CkanOrganization getOrganization(String organizationIdOrName)
        Returns a Ckan organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationIdOrName - either the name of organization (i.e. culture-and-education) or the alphanumerical id (i.e. 232cad97-ecf2-447d-9656-63899023887f). Do not pass it a group id.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getTagList

        public List<CkanTag> getTagList()
        Returns a list of tags names, i.e. "gp-practice-earnings","Aid Project Evaluation", "tourism-satellite-account". We think names SHOULD be lowercase with minuses instead of spaces, but in some cases they aren't.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getTagNamesList

        public List<String> getTagNamesList(String query)
        Returns tags containing the string given in query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

        Throws:

      • searchDatasets

        public SearchResults<CkanDataset> searchDatasets(String text,
                                        int limit,
                                        int offset)
        Search datasets containing provided text in the metadata
        Parameters:
        text - The query string
        limit - maximum results to return
        offset - search begins from offset. Starts from 0, so that offset 0 limit 1 returns exactly 1 result, if there is a matching dataset)
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • searchDatasets

        public SearchResults<CkanDataset> searchDatasets(CkanQuery query,
                                        int limit,
                                        int offset)
        Search datasets containg param text in the metadata
        Parameters:
        query - The query object
        limit - maximum results to return
        offset - search begins from offset
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error
